SUBJECT	: Traffic Mishap(R/I/R in Physical Injury and Damage to Property)
TDPO		: OOA 8:45 in the morning of January 4, 2022 along Maharlika Highway, Brgy.San Francisco, San Pablo City, Laguna

Involved Vehicles and Drivers: 
Vehicle 1(V1) – Hino Truck Dump Truck with no Plate attached owned by LGU San Pablo City and issued to City Solid Waste Management Office driven by Francisco Valencia Ballaran, male, 38 years old, married, driver and a resident of Brgy.San Ignacio, San Pablo City, Laguna, a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.D12-16-006289 with expiration date 2023-10-04, No OR and CR presented during investigation

Vehicle 2(V2) – Yamaha NMAX 2DPK MC with MV File No.1303-00000674152 covered with CR#36703175-5 dated 01-29-2020, OR#1811081716 dated 01-29-2020 registered under the name of Mark Allen Dy Albay with complete address at Blk2, Lot49, PH-2 Area 3, Longos, Malabon, NCR and driven by Jayson Lopez Garcia, male, 21 years old, single, delivery boy and a resident of Brgy.Longos, Malabon City, NCR, a holder of Driver’s License No.N25-19-026358 with expiration date 2023-11-27

Narrative:

	In reference with Blotter Entry No.2022-01-20, pleased be informed that at about 10:10AM of January 4, 2022, PSSg Alexis Lucido responded to vehicular accident transpired on the said TDPO and later brought to this Station the driver of V1 while the driver of V2 was brought to Hospital due to injury sustained. IOC immediately proceeded to the place of incident as well as to the hospital to conduct investigation which disclosed that V1 was coming from MEDEX Subd. and on the process of taking the Southbound lane heading to Brgy.San Ignacio, San Pablo City while V2 was traversing straight on the northbound lane coming from Quezon province going to Metro Manila when both vehicle figured in accident. As a result, driver of V2 sustained physical injury and was brought by Barangay Patrol to SPC General Hospital while both vehicles incurred damages on point of contact.

Initial investigation conducted based given account of both drivers involved disclosed that prior to the incident, both vehicles were on stop on the northbound lane of Calihan intersection while the traffic light was Red, V1(Toyota Vios) was occupying the inner lane while V2(Isuzu Traviz) was occupies the outer lane both heading to the direction of Alaminos, Laguna, V2 was ahead of V1 and when the traffic light turns Green, V2 suddenly swerved to the left that resulted in hitting the V1 wherein its left rear portion accidentally sideswept the left front portion of the V1. PCMS Francisco responded to the scene of incident and later turnover to the duty IOC all parties involved for proper disposition. Investigation disclosed that all vehicles were travelling along Cipriano Colago Ave. heading to the direction of northbound, V1(Toyota Innova Wagon) and V3(Isuzu Jitney PUJ) were occupying the inner lane while V2(Toyota Corolla Altis) was on the outer lane, V3 was behind V1 when V3 suddenly swerved to the outer lane but unfortunately sideswept the front left corner of V2 aside from this, V3 front left corner also hit/sideswept the rear right corner of the V1. Suspect: Richard Amoguis Orevillo, male, 25 years old, DOB: March 19, 1996, POB: Sam Paloc Manila, single, jeepney driver and a resident of Blk 15, Lt33, Brgy.Inocencio, Trece Martirez City, Cavite, a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.N04-17-001777 valid until 2026-03-19 and driver of Toyota Hiace Commuter Van color Silver Metallic with Plate No.GAM4633 covered with CR#42493911-5 dated 06-24-2021, OR#2119743393 dated 06-24-2021 registered to and owned by Bernard T Orevillo with complete address at B2, L2, Lancaster New City Br2, Pascam, General Trias, Cavite.

6. Why/How: In reference with Blotter Entry No.2022-03-687, about 2:08AM of March 6, 2022, a radio call was relayed to this Station by Barangay Control of San Vicente, San Pablo City regarding a vehicular accident transpired at about 12:58AM of March 6, 2022 along Maharlika Highway, San Vicente, San Pablo City. Investigation based on the footage of the Barangay CCTV disclosed that the said Toyota Hiace was travelling along the northbound lane of the Highway coming from Gumaca, Quezon and heading to the direction of Trece Martirez Cavite when the same vehicle accidentally hit and bumped the victim while crossing into a Pedestrian lane going to Total Gasoline Station. As a result, victim was dragged a few meters away from the place of incident causing him to sustained head injury and multiple abrasions throughout his body. Injured victim was brought to SPC General Hospital and will be transferred to other hospital for CT-Scan examination. Meanwhile the said vehicle suffered heavy damages on front portions including deep dents on front bumper, broken windshield, damaged radiator at leaked ATF.

6. Why/How: In reference with Blotter Entry No.2022-03-1026, pleased be informed that at about 7:20PM of March 20, 2022 this station received a radio call from barangay control San Ignacio SPL, Laguna regarding vehicular accident. The duty investigator immediately dispatched to verify the said report. Initial investigation conducted based on the information given by the driver of V1 and V2 disclosed that on the aforementioned DTPO, That V1 and V2 are both travelling along Maharlika highway Brgy San Ignacio SPC, Laguna, from south to north bound direction, V1 was ahead of V2 while V3 was travelling in opposite direction heading towards the direction of Tiaong, Quezon. That, upon reaching the place of accident, V3 suddenly occupied the lane of V1 and V2. Driver of V1 and V2 veer their steering wheels to the right to avoid contact to incoming V3 but V3 left fender got contact to the right fender of V1 and V2. As a result, thereof V1 incurred damages all throughout the left side fender including side mirror, while V2 also incurred damages all throughout the left side portion of the vehicle and detached spare tire and subsequently spin hitting a water meter base, V3 incurred damage on left side fender, detached left and right front wheel, Further, driver of V3 and passengers of V2 were brought to San Pablo City General, in Brgy.San Jose, San Pablo City for their medical treatment. Driver of V3 admitted that he was under the influence of alcohol when the incident happened and it was also confirmed by the attending physician of the said hospital.

Why/How: In reference with Blotter Entry No.2022-03-, at about 8:45PM, March 23, 2022, a telephone call was received by this Station from Barangay officials of San Gregorio, San Pablo City informing a vehicular accident happened at abovementioned TDPO. Duty investigators proceed to the reported place to confirm the report and initial investigation disclosed that both vehicles were traversing on the said Road in opposite direction, V1 was heading to the direction of San Gregorio while V2 was heading to city proper when V2 suddenly entered into the lane of V1 that resulted in a direct collision,
aside from this, V2 also hit a bicycle rider which travelling on the same direction with V1. Vehicle 2(V2) – Honda TC 125 with no plate available owned by John Leonard Hernandez and with address at Brgy.Bagong Bayan, San Pablo City, Laguna and driven by Felix Dizon Hernandez, male, 56 years old, married, laborer and a resident of Violeta st., Brgy.Bagong Bayan, II-A, San Pablo City, Laguna, a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.D14-96-073777 with expiration date 2023-01-30 with cp#0995-3304690
Vehicle 3(V3) – Honda ACB125CBFM Motorcycle with Plate No.683DNW covered with CR#42717221-1 dated 07-21-2021, OR#2135343431 dated 07-21-2021 registered under the name of Cesar Cusi Ramos with complete address at P5, Brgy.Soledad, San Pablo City, Laguna and driven by Mark Joseph Ramos Lazala, male, 23 years old, single, salesman and also resident of P5, Brgy.Soledad, San Pablo City, a holder of Non- Professional Driver’s License No.D14-19-010884 with expiration date 2024-08-31 with
cp#0995-9809-386 

6. Why/How: In reference with Blotter Entry No.2022-03-1135, at about 7:30AM of March 24, 2022, PAT Aries Manuel, beat Patrol personnel of this Station responded to a vehicular accident at Brgy.Bagong Bayan, San Pablo City and later brought and turnover to this office all drivers involved. Initial investigation based from the CCTV footage taken from the place of incident disclosed that Vehicles #1 and #2 were both travelling on the same direction at Southbound laner of Maharlika Highway, V1 was tailing V2 while V3 was travelling on opposite direction at northbound lane heading to Alaminos, Laguna direction when they reached the place of incident in front of Wilcon Depot, V2 slowed down and
subsequently came into stop at the inner lane before making a left turn heading to Brgy. Bagong Bayan, this city when its rear portion accidentally bumped by V2, As a result, V2 was pushed to the opposite lane and was figured in another accident with incoming V3. The incident resulted to the damages of all vehicles involved, V1-cracks, dents and scratches on front bumper and broken left headlight, V2 – heavy damages on front portion and rear portion deformed/dented inward and V3- broken left headlight and broken left fairing. Meanwhile driver of V2(Felix Dizon Hernandez) sustained minor abrasion on his left leg and left little finger while driver of V3(Mark Joseph Ramos Lazala) sustained lacerated
wounds on his left arm, both are advice to seek medical check-up but they refused to do
so. The case is under investigation

Vehicle 3(V3) – Isuzu Elf Dropside Truck color Yellow with Plate No.ZCB5751 covered with OR#22222843350 dated 01-20-2022, registered under the name of Theresa Marie Ong with complete address at LGD8 Opt Condominuim Bldg, Makati city and driven by Romiko Joel Capadosa Borres, male, 30 years old, single, delivery driver and a resident of Bldg 8, U4006 Permanent Housing Tondo, Manila, a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.N04-20-005986 with expiration date 2024-11-13 with cp#0910-5434-550

Based on initial investigation conducted it appears that V1(Mitsubishi Passenger Van) was pulling the V2(Isuzu Mini Dump Truck ) and was travelling straight at the Southbound lane of Maharlika Highway going to Quezon province while V3(Isuzu Elf Dropside Truck) was emerges from Phrist Subd., and about to take the Northbound lane of the same Highway going to Alaminos direction when V2 and V3 were figured in accident. frame, broken/cracked windshield, broken left head light assy and other internal damages thereon and V3- dents and scratched paint on left middle sidings. The case was under investigation

Vehicle 2(V2) – Rusi TC Motorcycle color Black with Plate No.DO43760 covered with CR#273914760 dated 04-10-2017, OR#1115834532 dated 04-05-2017 registered under the name  of Marjorie D Tenorio with complete address at #592 P.6, Calihan, San Francisco, San Pablo City, Laguna and driven by Jayson Tulao, male, 32 years old, with live-in partner, tricycle driver and a resident of Brgy.San Francisco, San Pablo City, a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.D14-17-007697 with expiration date 2022-04-06. With cp#0963-414-9990 

Vehicle 3(V3) – Honda CCG125WHJ MTC color Black with Plate No.928NAC covered with CR#302591203 dated 01-22-2018, OR#1312152752 dated 01-22-2018, registered under the name of Arnulfo N Marquez with complete address at DI Calihan, Brgy.San Francisco, San Pablo City and driven by Christian Benedict Marquez, male, 22 years old, single, tricycle driver and also resident of DI Calihan, Brgy.San Francisco, San Pablo City, a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.D14-18-008045 with expiration date 2023-03-28 with cp#0968-325-5622

Duty investigator immediately dispatched at the place of incident as well as to the hospital to conduct investigation relative thereto. Initial investigation conducted disclosed that
 V1(Toyota Fortuner SUV) was travelling along DI Calihan Road, heading to the direction of Maharlika Highway, V2(Rusi TC Motorcycle) and V3(Honda CCG125WHJ MTC) were both parked at tricycle terminal along the same road while the victim was standing in front of V3 when V1 accidentally bumped V2 from behind, as a result, V2 was pushed and subsequently bumped to V3, V3 was also pushed and hit the victim that resulted to his injury. KM30-9017515, registered to Gordon T Yap and resident of Tanque, Roxas City, Capiz and driven by Banado Moreno y Bueno 58 years old, married, OFW, and resident of Brgy Del Remedio San Pablo City, Laguna. 

Passenger: Bernardino Moreno y Bunao 47 years old, married, System Administrator of WIPRO/ Desktop support L2, and resident of 816 Luna St. Brgy Maslun Liliw, Laguna. (12/06/1974). The driver is holder of PDL with no. D06-00-219649 valid until 12/06/2022. CP # 09975141291.

6. Why/How: In reference with Blotter Entry No.2022-03-1200, pleased be informed that at about 10:40 PM of March 26, 2022 duty radio operator NUP Abarintos received a cellphone call from PSSg Dennis Fandiño informing that there is a vehicular accident along marhalika highway at Brgy Sta Maria Magdalena San Pablo City, Laguna. That upon received duty investigator were dispatched to conduct investigation. Initial investigation conducted based on the information given by the driver of V1 and V2 were stationary stop in the inner lane descending part of the highway heading toward city proper to give way to the vehicle coming from the opposite lane to pass because there is a truck under maintenance in ascending part of the highway, while V3 was travelling in same direction, That upon reaching the place of accident V3 accidentally hit and bumped V1 from behind because of impact V1 move forward and subsequently bumped V2 from behind. As a result, thereof V1 incurred damages on the back door, rear tail lights, rear bumper, front bumper, head lights and radiator while V2 also incurred damage on back door, bumper left and right tail lights. And V3 incurred damage on front bumper, left and right headlights and windshield. Responding personnel of CDRRMO immediately brought the driver of V3 including his passenger to Medical General Hospital Brgy San Rafael San Pablo City, Laguna for medical treatment. According to Dr Dorabelle Tolentino driver of V3 and his Passenger were positive on alcohol breath test.
Based on the statement given by Rodell Cortes passenger of V1 he immediately chased V3 because the driver veered his driven vehicle to the right outer lane possibly to evade the incident then he saw Banado Moreno y Bueno, a man alighted from the driver’s door and he also saw the passenger (Bernardino Moreno y Bunao) who seated at the front passenger seat however Mr Bernardino claimed that he was the one driving the same vehicle and not his brother (Banado) he also stated that he accidentally hit and bumped V2 from behind because of blind spot and suddenly stop on the highway.

Initial investigation conducted based on the information given by the driver of V1 and V2 disclosed that on the aforementioned DTPO, That V1 and V2 are both travelling along Maharlika highway Brgy San Ignacio SPC, Laguna, from south to north bound direction V1 occupied the inner lane while V2 occupied the outer lane. The driver V2 and his back ride was presumably under the influence of liquor. Further, back ride of V2 was also treated at said hospital who sustained minor on his head

Hiway Antipolo City and driven by Marlon Tomogan Ogeria, male, 35 years old, single, government

083-2700

Vehicle 2(V2) – Isuzu Giga Dump Truck color Blue Metallic with with Plate No.RKR519 covered
with CR#11226074-6 dated 01-04-2011, OR#2209769015 dated 11-26-2021, registered under the
name of MARCBILT CONSTRUCTION INC. with complete address at S-805 Richvill Corp Tower
Madrigal Park, Alabang, Muntinlupa city and driven by Alfredso Paderes Ocba, male, 63 years old,
married, driver and a resident of Marcbilt Compound, Paliparan II, Dasmariñas City, Cavite, a
holder of Driver’s License No.N04-93-260689 with expiration date 2026-12-23. Withcp#09070945750

Narrative: In connection with Blotter Entry No.2022-05-3486, pleased be informed that at about 9:46PM of May 20, 2022, Duty Barangay Officials San Rafael, SPC called this Station and reported the vehicular accident at abovementioned time, date and place of incident. That based on the information obtained from both drivers it reveals that both vehicles were travelling the said Highway using the Southbound lane, V1(Toyota Vios) occupies the outer lane while V2(Isuzu Giga Dump Truck) occupies the inner lane both heading to the direction of Quezon province when they arrived at the place of incident near SM San Pablo entrance/exit both vehicles figured in accident. According to the driver of V1, that he was tailing the vehicle of his brother Mark Byan one Mitsubishi Mirage G4 and the said Mirage successfully overtook the Dump truck(V2) by shifting to the inner lane because the outer lane was undergoing road construction, his brother was then come into stop in able to allow him to pass and when she was about to swerved to the same lane, V2 suddenly sideswept his driven vehicle while on the other hand, driver of V2 narrated that he was travelling straight on his lane when V1 suddenly cut/crosses into his lane that resulted in accident. Both vehicles incurred multiple damages at the point of contact, multiple scratches dented inward/ deformed front left quarter panel, driver’s door panel, front bumper and damage left side
mirror of Toyota Vios and detached right step board and minor damages on the front right corner of
the Dump Truck.

4. Where : Along Maharlika Highway, Brgy.San Francisco, San Pablo City 

5. Who :
Vehicles and Drivers involved:
Vehicle 1(V1) –Yamaha Sniper 150 MC color Midnignt Blue/Roe Gold without Plate No attached on it covered with CR#36338276-2 dated 08-09-2019, OR#2156559716 dated 09- 24-2021 registered under the name of Siaron Darwiun Sierra with complete address at #4418 NPC Road, Bagbaguin Brgy.165 Kalookan City and driven by Dojylon Palomares Reign, male, 28 years old, with live-in partner, welder peter and a resident of B3 L186 GL-2 Lancaster New City Pasong Tamo, Camachile,1 General Trias Cavite, a holder of Driver’s License No.N02-12-021397 with expiration date 2026-04-09.

Narrative: In connection with Blotter Entry No.2022-064727, pleased be informed that at about 11:30PM of June 16, 2022, a telephone call was received by San Pablo CPS from CDRRMO San Pablo City informing the abovementioned cited incident. Upon receipt of the report duty IOC immediately proceed to the place of accident as well as to the hospital to conduct investigation thereof. Information obtained disclosed that both vehicles were traversing the Provincial Road in opposite direction, V1 was coming from San Lorenzo, SPC going city proper while the latter was coming from city proper and heading to
the direction of Sto Angel, this city when V2 suddenly occupied into the lane of V1 to overtook a vehicle ahead of him that resulted to head on collision between them. V2 drtiver loses his control on the steering wheel and eventually slid of the road. As a result both drivers sustained injury and were brought to different hospital, V1 driver was brought to SPC General Hospital after suffering left wrist injury while V2 driver was brought to PPL-District Hospital but unfortunately he was declared dead on arrival by the attending Physician due to head injury. Meanwhile both vehicles incurred damages at the point of
contact.

IRF Nr. :043424-2022-06-5005; and c. Blotter Entry No.2022-06-5005 2. What: Road Crashed incident with Physical injury and Damage to Property 3. When: about 4:00AM of June 29, 2022 4. Where: Along Provincial Road, Brgy.Concepcion, SPC, Laguna. 5. Who: Involved Vehicles and Drivers: Vehicle 1(V1) – Suzuki FJ110CMD motorcycle with improvise sidecar with Plate No.2990TP covered with CR#10922202-4 dated 07-12-2010, OR#1988042733 dated 10-08-2020 registered under the name of the former owner Nomeriano S Sanchez with complete address at #93 S.Pedracio st., Dalig, Antipolo City, Rizal and presently owned and driven by Oliver Castillo Monecia, male, 36 years old, married, market vendor, a resident of M Santos Ext Brgy.2E, Rizal, Laguna, a holder of Non-Professional Driver’s License No.D19-13-001700 with expiration date 2023-10-03 Injured passenger of V1: Crizel Ponce Monecia, female, 37 years old, married to driver, market  vendor and also resident of Brgy.2E, Rizal, Laguna V2 – Honda TMX with improvised sidecar(kulong kulong) with Plate No.WY 6564 and driven by Jomar Valencia Resurreccion, male, legal age, married, delivery boy, a resident of Brgy.Banago, Nagcarlan, Laguna. No driver’s License, OR and CR found on his personal belongings 6. Why/How: In reference with Blotter Entry No.2022-06-5004, at about 4:55AM of June 29, 2022 duty Barangay officials of Concepion, SPC informed this office regarding the road crashed accident. Duty IOC immediately responded to the scene and  as per initial information gathered disclosed that both vehicles are travelling in opposite direction, V1 was coming from Rizal, Laguna heading to San Pablo city while V2 was coming San Pablo city going to Nagcarlan, Laguna  and when they arrived near Carmelite road V1 occupied the lane of V2 after avoiding a road under construction but when he was about to return to his lane chance upon that V2 was coming and both vehicles accidentally collided with each other. According to the driver of V1 that V2 was running on a speed. As a result, both drivers and passenger of V1 sustained body injuries but the driver of V2 suffered severe head injury after his head was hit to the tricycle windshield. All injured parties were rushed to  PPL Hospital for their medical treatment .Meanwhile both vehicles incurred damages on front portions.

OFFENSE: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO DAMAGE TO PROPERTY - RPC Art 365

NARRATIVE:
SUBJECT	: Spot report re Road Crashed accident
DATE		: July 5, 2022

            1. Reference:   
              a) IRF Nr: 043424-2022-07-5097, 5098 and 
              c) Blotter Entry Nr: 2022-07-5098- 5098. 

2. What         : Road Crashed accident(damage to property)
	3. When	: Transpired at about 11:00PM of July 4, 2022
	4. Where	: Along Maharlika Highway, Brgy.San Ignacio, San Pablo City, Laguna
			  
	5. Who	: 

Vehicle/Driver involved:
Vehicle 1(V1) -  Hino RM2P Passenger Truck BUS color(Multi-color) with Plate No.NBC5802  covered with CR#284077102 dated 04-20-2018, OR#2153721555 dated 03-03-2022 registered under the name of Bicol Isarog Transport System Inc.with complete address at CU Untong Bldg., Concepcion Grande, Naga City, Camarines Sur and driven Ruben Barrameda De Albay, Male, 59 years old, married, Bus driver and presently residing at Pasacao, Camarines Sur, a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.E04-84-015631 with expiration date 2032-07-03. With cp#0912-085-4609

Vehicle 2 -	Isuzu Elf Ref Van Truck with Plate No.NEG2841 covered with CR#38284279-5 dated 10-12-2020, OR#2162440556 dated 01-31-2022 registered under the name of BDo Leasing & Finance Inc. leased to Nuvel Global Ventures Inc.with complete address at 38F BDO Corp Center Ortigas 12 ADB Wack Wack Greenhills , Makati City and driven by Melvin Panteria Luspe, male, 28 years old, with live-in partner, driver and a resident of Brgy.San Miguel, Santo Tomas, Batangas, a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.N26-17-027751 with expiration date 2023-02-03. With cp#0981-301-6314

Narrative:

	At about 11:30PM of July 4, 2022 this Station received a viber call coming from the legal officer of Isarog Transport System informing that a road crashed accident transpired at abovementioned time, date and place of incident. Investigator of this office immediately responded thereat to verify the report and to provide police assist. That based from the Information gathered from both driver’s disclosed that above vehicles were travelling along Maharlika Highway coming from Metro Manila going to Naga City in Camarines Sur when upon arrival at the scene of incident, allegedly a closed Van 10 Wheeler with unknown Plate  suddenly emerge from Villars Gasoline Station entering the Maharlika Highway going to Quezon province, to prevent colliding with the said Closed Van, V1 applied brakes and went on full stop, however V2 accidentally bumped to the rear portion of the V1 and according to the driver he also applied brakes but indeed the accident occurred. The said incident resulted to the damages of both vehicles, V1 – damage exhaust, tail light, hole and dents on the rear cover and V2 – dented/scratched front hood, front bumper, front grill cover, damage left side mirror assy and broken front windshield and broken left head lumps. Other damages will be determined by the mechanic upon estimation.

OFFENSE: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365

1. Reference:
a) IRF Nr: 043424-2022-07-5186-5187 and
c) Blotter Entry Nr: 2022-07-5186-5187.
2. What : Road Crashed accident(Physical injury and damage to property)
3. When : Transpired at about 5:30PM of July 10, 2022
4. Where : Along Provincial Road, Brgy.Sta Elena, San Pablo City, Laguna

5. Who :
Vehicle/Driver involved:
Vehicle 1(V1) - Mitsubishi Double Cab Chicken Cage color White with Plate No.RFA591 covered with CR#36298405 dated 12-11-2019, OR#2180974530 dated 01-04-2022 registered under the name of Lolengs Fresh Chicken Corporation and driven by Lyoid Alagos Arbado, Male, 32 years old, married, driver and residing at Purok 2, Brgy.Labuin, Pila, Laguna, a holder of Driver’s License No.N26-11-008595 with expiration date 2031-11-16. With cp#0956-7465-848

Vehicle 2(V2) - Suzuki Skydrive MC color Black with Temporary Plate 0401-0865487 and driven by Rody Ebdane Sunga, male, 32 years old, with live-in partner, house helper and a resident of Brgy.Sta Elena, San Pablo City, Laguna. Driver failed to submit Driver’s License OR and CR of the vehicle
Injured backride of V2: Gina Katigbak Malaluan, female, 35 years old, live-in partner of Rody Sunga, house helper and also resident of Brgy.Sta Elena, San Pablo City, Laguna

Vehicle 3(V3) - Honda Civic Sedan color Dark Geen with Plate No.XDC145 covered with CR#45045526-1 dated 05-06-2022, OR#2243125614 dated 05-06-2022 registered under the name of Myrna U Hernandez with address at 1236 Instruction st., Sampaloc, Manila and sold to the driver Sherwin Reyes Paltado, male, 41 years old, single, photographer and a resident of Brgy.San Francisco, San Pablo City, Laguna, a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.D14-01-109643 with expiration date 2023-07-06. With cp#0915-915-4003

Narrative:
At about 6:24PM of July 10, 2022, a concern citizen reached this Station thru phone call informing that a road crashed accident happened at abovementioned time, date and place of incident. IOC immediately responded thereat to confirm the report and based from the CCTV Footage obtained from the scene of incident disclosed that V1 and V2 were both coming from Maharlika Highway going to the direction of San Cristobal, San Pablo City while V3 was heading Maharlika Highway(opposite) coming from Dolores, Quezon. V1 was ahead of V2 when V1 accidentally hit and pulled a low overhead wire attached to the
electric pole owned by PLDT Company. As a result the said electric pole was collapse and some secondary lines were cut prompting the V2 driver to swerve to the opposite lane to avoid it however V2 accidentally hit/bumped to the front windshield of incoming V3. As a result, driver and backrider of V2 sustained injury into their head and arm while both V2 and V3 incurred damages at the point of contact. V2- damages on the front and left side portion and V3- broken front windshield and dented/scratch front bumper and quarter panel.

7. IOC: PCPL Jerry L Obapial/0930-545-6666

OFFENSE: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO MULTIPLE PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
NARRATIVE: SUBJECT: Spot report re Road Crashed accidentDATE: July 13, 20221. Reference: a) IRF Nr: 043424-2022-07-5186-5240-5241 and c) Blotter Entry Nr: 2022-07-5186-5240-52412. What : Road Crashed accident(Physical injury and Multiple damages to property)3. When: Transpired at about 7:20PM of July 13, 20224. Where: Along Barangay Road of San Bartolome, San Pablo City, Laguna 5. Who: VehicleDriver involved:Vehicle 1(V1) Nissan Navarra Pick-up color Platinum Silver with Plate No.EBV791 covered with OR#2214129772 dated 02-07-2022 registered under the name of Jaypee Limaco Pamposa with complete address B77 L2 Area B San Jose Del Monte Bulacan and driven by Christian Yrigan Libay, male, 42 years old, married, farm owner and a resident of Brgy.San Bartolome, San Pablo City, a holder of Drivers License No.D06-02-239460 with expiration date 2031-11-25 Vehicle 2(V2) - Honda TMX Tricycle color Black with Plate No.DO57187 covered with OR#0472-000000007982 dated 05-05-2022 owned by Rodelo Dangwas Bonilla with complete address at Brgy.San Bartolome, San Pablo City Vehicle 3(V3) - Rusi TC125 MC color Black with Plate No.505OIF covered with CR#437758996 dated 02-09-2022, OR#2203066342 dated 02-09-2022 registered under the name of Leila Fernandez Bicomong with complete address at 0719 Purok3 San Miguel, San Pablo City, Laguna and owned by John Leicos Bicomong, male, 19 years old, single, student and a resident of Brgy.San Miguel, San Pablo City, Laguna Vehicle 4(V4) Kawasaki Barako color Black with Plate No.DP14216 covered with OR#1950162266 dated 11-23-2020 registered under the name of the owner Adonis Bonilla Cortez, male, 45 years old, married, Sari-Sari store owner and a resident of Brgy.San Bartolome, San Pablo City, LagunaVehilce 5(V5) Honda TMX 125 Tricycle with Plate No.DP10941 presently owned by Joel Dones Manozon, male, 30 years old, with live-in partner fruit vendor and a resident of Brgy.San Bartolome, San Pablo City, LagunaNarrative:In connection with Blotter Entry No.2022-07-5240, pleased be informed that at about 7:29PM of July 13, 2022, a telephone call was received by San Pablo CPS from National Emergency Hotline 911 informing this Station that a road crashed incident happened at abovementioned time, date and place. Duty IOC immediately proceeded to the reported place of incident to verify the report which disclosed that the said Vehicle 1 was travelling along the Barangay Road in San Bartolome, SPC coming from San Bartolome and heading to the direction of San Miguel, SPC while V2, V3, V4 and V5 were all parked along the roadside when V1 accidentally collided and sideswept with the V2 and V3 thereafter V1 also hit a two persons identified as Mary Jean Galano Aniscol, female, 58 years old, married, public school teacher and a resident of San Bartolome, SPC and Drew Yumul Eseo, male, 14 years old, grade 9 student and also resident of San Bartolome, SPC who were both walking coming from Sari-Sari Store. After damaging V2 and V3 V1 also collided with both V4 and V5 likewise damaging two(2) water meter base along the roadside. As a result all vehicles involved suffered undetermined amount of damages and repairs on different portions while Mary Jean Galano Aniscol and Drew Yumul Eseo were both sustained injuries into their bodies and were brought to SPC Medical Center for their medical treatment. Furthermore interview conducted to Mr Christian Yrigan Libay denied that he was the one driving his vehicle when the incident happen and instead he was claiming that certain Nestor Averion, male, legal age and also resident of Brgy.San Bartolome was actually driving his vehicle.

Why/How: In connection with blotter entry no. 2022-07-5475 pleased be informed that at about 9:05PM of July 28, 2022, Barangay Officials of San Jose, SPC called this Station to report a road crash incident happened at abovementioned time, date and place. IOC together with CDRRMO personnel responded thereat and provided police assistance to both injured drivers. Information gathered from the said drivers disclosed that they were both travelling along Alvarez st in opposite direction, V1 was heading to Brgy.San Jose, SPC from San Pablo City proper while V2 was coming from San Jose and going to city proper when V2 partly occupied into the lane of V1 and as a result V2 overshoot and

Furthermore, during interview conducted at the Hospital V2 driver admitted that he was under the influence of alcohol during the incident.

5. Who: Vehicles and Drivers involved:

Vehicle 1(V1) - Suzuki Tricycle with Plate No. XA5588 covered with CR#4168783-3 dated 10-31-2006 registered under the name of Joel Jumawan with complete address at Hermanos Belen, Brgy,.III-F, San Pablo City and driven by Oriel Nacar Jumawan, male, 44 years old, with live-in partner, tricycle driver and a resident of Brgy.sto Niño, San Pablo City.with Professional Driver’s License No.D14-10-000655 with expiration date 2024-06-02. Deceased

Vehicle 2(V2 )- Isuzu Forward Aluminum Wingvan color white with Plate No.CAI2968 registerted under the name of Monnet Culla Abad with complete address at Olongapo city, Zambales and driven by Castor Jr Mendanor Esgallera, male, 26 year old, single, driver and a resident of 083 G Lazaro Dalandanan, Valenzuela city with Driverse License No.N25-16-004468 with expiration date 2023-06-30. 0997-391-4435/0969-2512304

Vehicle 3(V3) - Isuzu 10W Cargo Wingvan color White with Plate No.GAG3999 covered with CR#267272655 dated 08-22-2017, OR#2123402002 dated 09-15-2021 and driven by Jeffrey Rosaupan Delima, male, 33 years old, married, driver and a resident of #16 Parena st. Why/How: In reference with Blotter Entry No.2022-08-5551, Pleased be informed that at about 1:00AM of August 4, 2022, CDRRMO San Pablo city informed this office thru phone call that a road crash accident transpired at above stated time, date and place, in response to the report, PCPL Cornejo responded to the place of incident to verify the report and later brought and turnover to this office both drivers of V2 and V3 while the driver of V1 was brought to SPC General Hospital. Investigation based from the CCTV footage taken from the place of incident, that V1 and V2 were both travelling along the Southbound Maharlika Highway (from north to south bound) while  V3 was traversing on the opposite lane(from south to north bound) V1 was ahead  of V2 upon arrival at the intersection, V1 slowed down and subsequently went into full stop to turn left going to Brgy.Sto Niño, San Pablo City when its rear portion accidentally bumped by V2, due to the strong impact, V1 was pushed into the opposite lane and was also hit and bumped by the incoming V3. Meanwhile all vehicles incurred visible damages.

SUBJECT	: Spot Report re Road Crash Incident (Hit and Run)
DATE		: August 27, 2022
          1. Reference:   
              a) IRF Nr: 043424-2022-08-5996; and 
              b) Blotter Entry Nr: 2022-08-5996-5997. 
2. What	: Road Crash Incident RIR in Homicide, Serious Physical Injury and Damage to Property
3. When	: On or about 8:47PM of August 27, 2022
	Time Reported: OOA 11:20PM of August 27, 2022
4. Where	: Brgy road of Brgy. San Juan, San Pablo City, Laguna.
5. Who	: 
Vehicle 1 – Honda ZN125 MC with plate no. 6794-WD, engine no. KPG00E022851, chassis no. KPG00022842, covered with CR no. 42716594-4 dated July 13, 2021, OR no. 2135317785 dated July 13, 2021, registered in the name of Celedonio Coronado Quezon and driven by Jervis Tarzona Alcantara, 30 years old, married, production operator (DOB; June 10, 1992, EA; High school graduate) and resident of Brgy. Sta. Filomena, San Pablo City, Laguna. Back ride – Jaylin Martin Alcantara, 29 years old, married, employee of Puregold (DOB; August 30, 1992, EA; College graduate) and resident of Brgy. Sta. Filomena, San Pablo City, Laguna

Vehicle – 2 Toyota Fortuner with plate no. UKQ-584, engine no. 2KDU251738, chassis no. MHFZR69GX03062685, covered with CR no. 171791970 dated July 01, 2013, OR no. 2228595714 dated April 28, 2022, registered in the name of Exclusive Cars International Holdin and driven by Jason Tesoro Jabonillo, 29 years old, with live in partner, construction worker (DOB; April 25, 1993, EA; Elementary under graduate) native of Brgy. Tubtubon Sibulan, Dumaguete City and residing at St. John village, purok 4, Brgy. San Juan, San Pablo City, Laguna, no driver’s license presented

	6. Why/How:

		In relation to blotter entry no. 5996 report reaching this station that a Road Crash Incident transpired at the above mentioned DTPO, upon receipt of said report duty investigator proceed thereat to conduct investigation. Information gathered that V1 was travelling along barangay rod of Brgy. San Juan, San Pablo City heading the direction of Sta. Filomena this city, while V2 coming from E.M resort and traversing the opposite lane upon reaching the place of occurrence V2 accidentally hit/bumped V1, after the incident V2 driver did not even stop and immediately fled away the place of incident. Due to the said accident driver of V1 and his back ride sustained severe head injury and were brought to PPL hospital for medical treatment But unfortunately the back ride(Jaylin Martin Alcantara) was declared dead on arrival as per her attending Physician Dra. Doraley Selvio. Meanwhile IOC together with Barangay Chairman Belda immediately conducted follow-up operation and investigation thru backtracking of available CCTV footages installed at the place of incident which resulted to the successful identification and arrest of the driver/suspect likewise the owner of the vehicle identified as Mr. Mandy Santos, the said owner voluntarily surrendered to this Station the vehicle involved. After the arrest of driver/suspect he was brought to this station for proper investigation and documentation. Progress report to follow.

Who: Vehicles and Drivers involved: Vehicle 1(V1)- Honda ACB125CBFL Motorcycle with MV File#0401-00001221312 covered with CR#39265281-5 dated08-03-2020, OR#2149373951 dated 10-06-2021registered, owned and driven by Alyana Pauline Aquino Zaulda, female, 25 years old, DOB:Nov.20, 1996, POB: San Pablo City, single, jobless native of Brgy.San Ildefonso, Alaminos, Laguna and presently residing at Sitio Morpa Purok 2, Brgy.Sto Niño, San Pablo City, Laguna, a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.D12-21-203725 with expiration date 2026-11-24. Cp#0955-3362969 Vehicle 2 (V2) - Unknown Sedan color light brown 6. Why/How: In connection with blotter entry no. 2022-08-5998 pleased be informed that this Station received an information from Ms Alyana Pauline Aquino Zaulda thru the PNP Hotline Facebook Page regarding a road crash incident happened on the said time, date and place. In response to the report, IOC immediately communicated to Ms. Zaulda for proper disposition and subsequently proceeded to her present address at Brgy.Sto Nino, San Pablo City to conduct investigation relative to her complaint. Based from the account given by the herein reportee, she was driving her vehicle(V1) and traversing straight along Maharlika Brgy.San Francisco, San Pablo City coming from Alaminos, Laguna bound to Brgy.Sto Niño, San Pablo City and while reaching near Mega Disco and Medex Subd., in Brgy.San Francisco, San Pablo city a color light brown Sedan(V2) which coming from Mega Disco suddenly crosses into her lane and eventually they were figured in accident. Ms Zaulda further stated that she exerted all means to avoid the collision by swerving to the right but indeed the accident happened. Due to the said accident, the herein driver sustained abrasion on her left knee and omplaining shoulder pain likewise her vehicle also incurred visible damages on the left side.At about 10:20AM of August 28, 2022, Mr Elmer Carandang Granada, male, 74 years old, married, businessman and a resident of Brgy.Concepcion, San Pablo City appeared before this office and identified himself as the driver and owner of the said color light brown sedan with complete description Toyota Corolla 4dr sedan color Beige with Plate No.WJH231 which was involved in a road crash accident. That according to him, he was slowly crossing the Highway coming from Mega Disco going to the other side at Petron Gasoline Station and his vehicle already encroached to the Gasoline Station when the front right side part of his vehicle suddenly bumped by incoming vehicle 1 and due to the said incident his vehicle incurred dents and scratches on front right quarter panel and broken side mirror. Meanwhile both drivers already entered into an amicable settlement.

OFFENSE: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
VICTIMS Address (Local): Brgy.I-B, San Pablo City,
NARRATIVE: SUBJECT : Spot report re Traffic mishap DATE : August 30, 2022  1. Reference: a) Standard Operating Procedure b) IRF Nr: 043424-2022-08-6047 and c) Blotter Entry Nr: 2022-08-6047. 2. What : R/I/R in Physical Injury and Damage to Property 3. When : Transpired at 10:00AM of August 30, 2022 4. Where : Along ML Quezon st., Brgy.Brgy.I-B, San Pablo City, Laguna 5. Who : Vehicles and Drivers involved: Vehicle 1(V1) – Rusi TC125 color Black with attached Temporary Plate No.0401-00000786274 covered with CR#327394756 dated 10-25-2018, OR#1489002362 dated 10-25-2018 registered and owned by Hilario Sayago Alba with complete address at #0557 Wallside st., Bagong Bayan, II-A, San Pablo City and driven by Jay-R Catarunga De Vega , male, 29 years old, single, Brgy.Tanod/Tricycle driver and a resident of Brgy.I-B, San Pablo City, a holder of Driver’s License No.D12-18-003582 with expiration date 2032-09-22. With cp#0950-341-9086. Vehicle 2(V2) – Isuzu NKR66E Armored Van color Gray with License Plate attached XKC704 covered with CR#318380624, OR#2251557350 dated 04-11-2022 registered under the name of CTK Incorporated with office address at #70 N Roxas st., Quezon city, NCR and driven by Emiliano Castrillo Manguerra, male, 52 years old, married, Security guard/Armored car driver and a resident of Brgy.Malitlit, Sta Rosa, Laguna, a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.D04-89-029087 with expiration date 2023-07-20. With cp#0912-7689-211 6. Why/How: In connection with Blotter Entry No.2022-08- 6047, please be informed that at about 12:20PM of August 30, 2022, Duty Barangay Officials of Brgy.I-B, SPC called this Station and reported the road crashed accident at aforementioned TDPO. Duty IOC proceeded thereat to confirm the report and based from the CCTV footage of from the place of incident revealed that V1(Tricycle) was travelling straight along ML Quezon st coming from Colago Avenue going to I-B, this city while V2(Isuzu NKR66E Armored Van) was coming from the same direction and about to parked in front of ALFA Mart and while moving backward on diagonal direction when both vehicles figured in accident wherein the sidewheel of the tricycle and the front left corner of the Armored vehicle got into contact and due to the strong impact the said tricycle overturn causing the driver to sustained injury on his lower back and left armed. Meanwhile both vehicles incurred visible damages and repairs at the point of contact. Further, according to the V1 driver, that he was travelling straight when the said Armored vehicle abruptly steered to the right while moving backward causing the vehicle to hit to the tricycle while according to the V2 driver that the tricycle was moving on speed and suddenly sideswept to the front left corner of the Armored vehicle. Injured driver was rushed to PPL Hospital for his medical treatment.

OFFENSE: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
NARRATIVE: SUBJECT : Spot Report re Road Crashed Accident/hit and run(physical injury) DATE : September 9, 2022  1. References: a) Standard Operating Procedure b.)IRF Nr. : 043424-202209- 6208 c) Blotter Entry Nr: 202209-6208 2. WHAT : Road Crashed Accident 3. WHEN : On or about 11:10 in the evening of September 8, 2022 4. WHERE: Along Maharlika highway, Brgy.II-C, San Pablo City, Laguna. 5. WHO : Victim: Rilijan Gesmundo Sabando, male, 38 years old, DOB: Dec.3, 1984, POB: San Pablo City, Laguna, married, driver and a resident of Brgy.Sta Maria, San Pablo City, Laguna VEHICLE/DRIVER INVOLVED: Six Wheeler Forward Truck(color White) with unknown Plate 6. WHY/HOW: In relation to Blotter Entry No.2022-09-6207, pleased be informed that at about 12:00AM of September 9, 2022, 911 National Emergency Hotline forwarded to this Station the information of road crash incident which happened on the said time, date and place. In response thereof, duty investigators immediately proceed to the place of incident to verify the report as well as to conduct investigation relative thereto. Based from the CCTV footage taken from the scene of incident disclosed that victim was walking coming from Andoks Litson and about to traverse the Maharlika Highway going to the other side when an approaching six wheeler Forward Truck which travelling at thesame Highway(moving south to northbound direction) accidentally hit him. As a result, victim fell down causing him to sustained right shoulder injury/head injury and was brought to PPL-City hospital by CDRRMO ambulance. The said victim was currently on stable condition but will be transfer to SPC Medical center for CT-scan examination. This station is now conducting backtracking of CCTV footage to identify the route of the involved vehicle.

Quezon and driven by Joven Oabel Pagana 36 years old, single, bus driver and resident of Brgy

6. Why/How: In reference with Blotter Entry No.2022-09-6311, pleased be informed that at
about 1:40 PM of September 14, 2022 this station received a telephone call from Barangay Official of
Brgy 1-B San Pablo City, Laguna and reported the road crash incident. The duty investigator
immediately dispatched to conduct investigation. According to the information given by the driver of
V1 and V2 both vehicles were travelling along Maharlika highway Brgy., 1-B coming from Tiaong,
Quezon heading Alaminos direction. When V1 on process of turning left going to Material World
Builders Depot, driver of V2 immediately apply his brake to stop but his driven vehicle was still on
moving then accidentally hit from behind of V1, because of impact V1 move forward and accidentally
hit hit and bumped V3 which was parked unattended on the parking area of Material World Builders
Depot, V3 moved backward then accidentally hit the victim, Edwin Reyes ambulant vendor. As a
result, victim complaining his left leg and was brought to PPL San Pablo City, Laguna by the
responding team of CDRRMO for medical treatment. While driver of V1 was also complaining chest
pain was brought to Medical Center San Pablo City for treatment. All involved vehicles incurred un-
estimated cost of damages.

WHERE : Brgy.Del Remedio, San Pablo City, Laguna. 5. WHO : VEHICLES/DRIVERS INVOLVED: Vehicle 1: Rusi Tricycle color white with plate no. covered with CR no.339729342 dated 02-20-2019 and OR no.156533933 dated 06-17-2021 under the name of Bobby Retardo Villanueva with complete address of P3 Santa Monica,San Pablo City and driven by Bobby Retardo Villanueva,male,driver and a resident of Sta.Monica San Pablo City,Laguna a holder of professional drivers license no. D14-04-116407 with expiration dated 2024-02-15. Vehicle 2: Unidentified motor vehicle color black (SUV) Victim/Pedestrian: Emiliano Dela Roca Marasigan, male, 55 years old(DOB: June 30,1967,EA: Undergraduate HRM),self employed, and a resident of Brgy.Imok,Calauan,Laguna.(Deceased) WHY/HOW; In connection with blotter entry no. 2022-09-6398, at about 9:00PM of September 19, 2022, a call from the Brgy.control of Brgy.Del Remedio,San Pablo City,Laguna informing San Pablo City Police Station that a road crash incident transpired at the said place. Based on the investigation, that prior to the incident, vehicle 1 was traveling heading towards Calauan Laguna direction, coming from City Proper San Pablo while V2 was traveling the opposite direction of V1 and the victim/pedestrian was walking across the road coming from the shoulder of the highway. Upon reaching the place of occurrence, the front portion of V1 was hit/bumped to the victim then the victim fell and rolled over by the rear left tire of V2. After the incident, V2 fled away from the crime scene while the victim was rushed to San Pablo General Hospital but declared dead on arrival as per attending physician and the driver of V1 was accosted by the responding elements of this station.

What: Road Crash Incident (Resulting to Homicide) 3. When: At about 5:30 AM of September 21, 2022 4. Where: Along Maharlika highway at Brgy. San Francisco Calihan SPC, Laguna. 5. Who: Victim Rey Concon 62 years old, male, married, air condition technician, and resident of Block 83 lot 77 Bautista Property Sampaloc IV, Dasmarinas City, Laguna,and Presently residing at Brgy Francisco SPC, Laguna (DOB September 5, 1960), (EA Elementary graduate) Involved Vehicles and Drivers: V1- Ford Everest, color blue, driven by unidentified male person V2- Toyota Corola color Gray bearing plate no.TJX, CR no. 12355929-5 dated 09-21-2011, OR no. 2228509592 dated 03-29-2022, engine no.4AK328715, chassis no.AE1019513777 registered to the name Val L Alcazar and resident of 6 Quezon st Brgy II Tiaong, Quezon and driven by the owner Joseph Hadoca Magracia 28 years old, married, driver and resident of Brgy San Antonio I SPC, Laguna DOB: 06-19-1994, EA College graduate. Holder of PDL No. D14-13-000292 with expiration date 2023-06-19. Contact No. 09956409171 6. Why/How: In reference with Blotter Entry No.2022-09-6419, pleased be informed that about 6:00 AM of September 21, 2022, San Pablo City Police received a telephone call from PCPL Roel Quiano and reported the road crash incident along Maharlika highway at Brgy. San Francisco SPC, Laguna. Duty investigators immediately dispatched to conduct investigation. Based on the CCTV footage gathered while the victim crosses on the highway going to other side was accidentally hit and bumped by V1 which was travelling the same highway heading towards Southbound (Tiaong Quezon direction). Driver of V1 made a stop for a while to check the victim but afterwards left the victim going to the direction of Tiaong. Quezon. Based on the information given by the driver of V2 while he was travelling on the inner lane going to Tiaong, Quezon direction he did not see the victim lying on the highway then he accidentally hit and bumped the victim. Responding CDRRMO rescue team immediately brought the victim to San Pablo General Hospital Brgy San Jose SPC, Laguna for treatment but the duty Attending Physician Dr Marvin Bautista declared the victim dead on arrival. Duty investigator conducted follow up investigation which resulted to the arrest of driver of V2. Driver of V2 was brought to San Pablo City Police Station for documentation and proper disposition. Criminal complaint was being prepared for filing before the office of City Prosecutor San Pablo City, Laguna.

Information given by both drivers revealed that they were both traveling along Maharlika Highway, Brgy. San Nicolas, San Pablo City, Laguna, both heading to the direction of Tiaong, Quezon, and V1 was about to turned left towards Lynville subd. when the rear portion of V1 was hit/bumped by the front portion of V2. Driver of V2 was brought to Panlalawigan Pagamutan ng Laguna and sustained right shoulder fractured and in stable condition as per information given by Dra. Selvio, attending physician. Both vehicles incurred visible damages.

Who: Involved Vehicles and Drivers: V1 – Rusi motorcycle color red, no plate Number and driven by the owner Jordan Labutoy Gabuat 19 years old, single, cook (DOB August 21, 2003), (AE Elementary Graduate) and resident of Brgy Sto Angle, San Pablo City, Laguna. OR no. 0472-000000023998 dated 07/07/2022 registered and driven by the owner Marcial Borres Molo, 49 years old, married, tricycle driver and resident of Brgy Concepcion SPC, Laguna, (DOB 11/26/1973), (AE High School graduate) a holder of Professional driver’s license with Nr. D14-01-114482 and will be expire on 2023-11-26. 6. OFFENSE: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO HOMICIDE - RPC Art 365
VICTIMS Address (Local): Brgy.Sta Maria, San Pablo city, Laguna,
NARRATIVE:
SUBJECT       :  	Spot Report re Road Crash Accident(R/I/R in Homicide and Damage to Property)

	DATE		:    December 18, 2022 

           	        1. References:   
                        a) Standard Operating Procedure
b.)IRF Nr. : 043424-2022- 12-8025
                        c) Blotter Entry Nr: 2022-12 -8025

        2. WHAT	: Road Crash Accident(R/I/R in Homicide and damage to property)

        3. WHEN	: On or about 01:00AM of December 18, 2022

        4. WHERE: Maharlika Highway, Brgy.San Vicente, San Pablo City, Laguna.

        5. WHO	: Vehicles and Persons involved: 

Vehicle 1(V1) – Suzuki Rider 150 color Black with Plate No.916OKD covered with CR#42229420-2 dated 06-22-2021, OR#2083425573 dated 06-22-2021 registered, owned and driven by Aristeo Pujanes Moreno, male, 37 years old, DOB: 1985-08-27, married, warehouse analysts and a resident of Brgy.Sta Maria, San Pablo city, Laguna, a holder of Driver’s License No.D14-14-007031 with expiration date 2032-08-27.

Vehicle 2(V2) – unidentified Sedan color White with unknown plate number.

6. WHY/HOW:

Narrative: In connection with Blotter Entry No.2022-12-8024 please be informed that at about 10:30AM of December 18, 2022, this Station received information from PPL Hospital that there was a victim of road crash incident transpired on the said time, date and place brought thereon. Duty investigator immediately proceed to the said hospital as well as to the place of incident to conduct investigation and based from the information gathered disclosed that V1(Suzuki Rider) was traversing at the northbound lane of Maharlika Highway coming from Brgy.San Antonio 2 and heading to Brgy.Sta Maria both in SPC when the said motorcycle accidentally hit into the manhole causing the driver to throw up in the middle of the road and chance upon that a speeding vehicle V2(unidentified sedan) was passing coming from the same direction dragged the injured driver MOL 500meters away from the place of incident and unfortunately the driver didn’t stop and instead he accelerated his vehicle going to the direction of Brgy.San Francisco, SPC. Victim was brought to PPL hospital by CDRRMO rescue team but was declared dead on arrival by the attending physician. This station is now conducting follow-up investigation to locate and identify the fleeing driver.

Who : Victim: Irish Joylyn Kalaw Angcana, 18 years old, single, student and resident of Barangay Sto. Cristo, San Pablo City, Laguna Suspect: Joseph Daria Dagal, 34 years old and resident of Barangay San Buenaventura, San Pablo City, Laguna (at large) 6. How: In relation to blotter entry no. 8033, victim accompanied by her mother personally appeared to this station and stated that she want to file a case for Serious Physical injury against the suspect. Based on the information obtain of herein victim that prior to the incident she was walking along Barangay VII-E, San Pablo City when on the middle of the road a tricycle driven by the suspect suddenly appeared and accidentally bumped into him resulting in three of his toes being broken, that after the said accident, the suspect did not even help the victim to take her to the nearest hospital for treatment, but left immediately the place of occurrence. Moreover, the said case of RIR in Serious Physical Injury was already filed at CPO San Pablo city with NPS Docket No.IV-18-INV-00438 dated December 19, 2022 duly administered by Hon.Katrina P Hernandez, Associate City Prosecutor.

Why/How: In connection with blotter Entry no. 8052 that this station received a cellphone call by NUP Jovellano radio operator San Pablo CPS from CDRRMO rescue team informing this office that they responded to a road crash incident at the said time, date and place and they already brought the injured person to SPC Medical Center for medication. OFFENSE: RECKLESS IMPRUDENCE RESULTING TO MULTIPLE PHYSICAL INJURY - RPC Art 365
NARRATIVE: SUBJECT : Spot Report re Road Crash incident DATE : December 25, 2022 1. References: a. Standard Operating Procedure b. IRF Nr. :043424-2022-12-8140; and c. Blotter Entry No.2022-12-8140 2. What: RIR in Double Physical injuries and Multiple Damage to Properties 3. When: On or about 1:30PM of December 25, 2022 4. Where: Along Maharlika Highway, Brgy.San Francisco, SPC, Laguna. 5. Who: Involved Vehicles and Drivers: Vehicle 1(V1) - Toyota Hiace Commuter Van color White with Plate No. DAL3275 covered with CR#345807825 dated 03-28-2019, OR#1583549074 dated 03-28-2019 registered under the name of TFSPH being leased to Jardse Langcuyan Macaraeg and driven by Jose Rey Jalipa Constantino, male, 57 years old, married, driver and a resident of B43 L22 P3 Golden city, Imus Cavite, with Driver’s License No.D06-88-036696 with expiration date 2027-11-09 Vehicle 2(V2) –  Toyota Vios sedan color Grayis Blue with Plate No.DBA 7933 covered with CR#39407707-3 dated 09-14-2020, OR#1969972841 dated 09-14-2020 registered under the name of TFSPH and being leased to the driver Irving Devierte Artajo, male, 37 years old, with live-in partner, engineer and a resident of B2 L8 David st. Seaview Subd, Silay city, Negros Occidental, a holder of Non-Professional Driver’s License no.F01-16- 001224 with expiration date 2023-05-08 Injured passengers/occupants of V2: 1. Fatima Astrera y Ortazon, female, 36 years old, widow, production operator and a resident of Brgy.San Miguel sto tomas, batangas 2. Alyza astrera y Ortazon, 10yo grade student and also resident of Brgy.San Miguel sto tomas, batangas Vehicle 3(V3)-   Isuzu Jitney passenger vehicle with No.DKJ107 covered with CR#4169440-2 dated 11-21-2006, OR#0472-000000037604 dated 08-19-2022 and driven by Aurio Penaloza Landicho, male, 59 years old, married, driver and a resident of Brgy.San Cristobal, San Pablo city, Laguna.a holder of Professional Driver’s License No.D14-87- 026208 with expiration date 2024-07-19 6. Why/How: In reference with Blotter Entry No.2022-12-8139, pleased be informed that at about 3:20PM of December 25, 2022, PCPL Fernando and Pat Ofren informed this office regarding a road crash incident transpired at above TDPO. Duty IOC immediately proceeded thereon to conduct investigation which disclosed that V1 and V2 were both travelling at the South bound lane while V3 was travelling at the opposite lane(northbound), V1 was on the outer lane while V2 was on the inner lane when V3 occupied the lane of V2 that led to a head on collision between them, thereafter V2 steered to the right to avoid the collision but eventually sideswept to the rear right side corner of the V1. The accident resulted to the injury of V2 passengers wherein Fatima Astrera sustained head injury while her daughter Alyza Astrera sustained minor injury and were rush to SPC Medical Center for their medication. Meanwhile all vehicles incurred damages such as V1-minor scratches on rear left side and broken tail light(left), V2-heavy damages on front portion(almost total wreck), V3- heavy damages on front portion. According to the driver of V3 that he was travelling straight when he suddenly felt that his brakes was stuck thus he was prompted to steered to the left to avoid colliding with vehicle in front of him however he was figured in a head on collision with the incoming V2 .

NARRATIVE: SUBJECT : Spot Report re Road Crashed Incident DATE : December 28, 2022  1. References: a) IRF Nr. : 043424-202212-8187 b) Blotter Entry Nr: 2022-12-8186 and 8187. 2. WHAT : Road Crashed Incident 3. WHEN : On or about 11:15 in the evening of December 28, 2022 (TIME REPORTED 11:40 PM of December 28, 2022). 4. WHERE : Maharlika Highway, Brgy. San Ignacio, San Pablo City, Laguna. 5. WHO : VEHICLES/DRIVERS INVOLVED V1- Isuzu Aluminum Van with plate nr. RNC 694 covered with Certificate of Registration # 164002484 dated 05-14-2013 and with Official Receipt # 2228006211 dated 04-20-2022 and registered to Pure Snacks Food House Corp with address at and being driven by Bryan Villamor, 31 years old, married, driver and resident of Brgy. Pasolo, Valenzuela City, NCR (DOB-04-01-1991, POB- Santa Catalina, Negros Oriental, EA- High School level and with contact # 09192948440), holder of Professional Driver’s License # A05-13-008297 valid until 2024-04-01. V2- Euro 150 MTC with no plate and being driven by Mauricio Andes Capila, 45 years old, married, laborer and resident of Brgy. Anastacia, Tiaong, Quezon (DOB- 08-14-1977, POB- San Pablo City, Laguna, EA- Elementary graduate and with contact #09352771512). Failed to present Driver License and Pertinent papers of his driven MTC. WHY/HOW; On or about 11:40 in the evening of December 28, 2022, relayed to San Pablo CPS, information of injured person being treated at Panlalawigan Pagamutan ng Laguna, victim of road crashed incident that transpired at the above DTPO. Investigators of this station immediately dispatch to conduct investigation. Information gathered from both drivers revealed that they were both traveling along Maharlika highway, Brgy. San Ignacio, San Pablo City, on opposite direction V1 heading to Alaminos, Laguna and V2 heading to Tiaong, Quezon, V2 overtook other vehicle and suddenly went to the lane of V1, when the right front portion of V1 was hit by the right side portion of V2. Driver of V2 sustained injury and was brought to hospital under observation and subjected to alcohol breath test and yielded a positive result for alcohol as per information given by Dr. Malveda, attending physician. As a result of said incident both vehicles incurred visible damages.
